main event: A sighting of a very long, bright light that appeared less than any known aircraft occurred on November 7, 1957 in Wintzville, Missouri.
interesting points: The observation lasted less than 1 minute,The object was described as having the appearance of bright light on a string,The sighting was under control of radar at a local airport,The sighting involved a single object moving south,The report was submitted by a civilian.
